description.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Buildings and Grounds maintains existing schools and offices (except the central office at 1000 Broadway). They maintain items like plumbing, electrical systems, carpentry, alarms, telephones, and heating systems. A different program (","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"entry-hyperlink","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{"target":{"sys":{"id":"2f1dpShg2PvuzzCg2L1BnB","type":"Link","linkType":"Entry"}}}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"entry-hyperlink","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Facilities Planning","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{"target":{"sys":{"id":"2f1dpShg2PvuzzCg2L1BnB","type":"Link","linkType":"Entry"}}}},{"nodeType":"text","value":") is responsible for construction and major renovation.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}]}
